page.title: 09TRUSTEES SAVINGS BANK
page.content: T.S.B.is one of the main banks in Gainsborough.It is situated on the corner of Market Street and Heaton Street.My Grandfather is called Mr Walter Chadwick. He worked there as a bank clerk for many years before he retired in 1980. Most people have an ordinary account pass book in which all deposits and withdrawls are recorded. Every year on November 20th any interest.Which have been earned is added to their accounts. Some people also have special deposit accounts.Which pay extra interest.The T.S.B.lends people money to help with home improvements or car purchase. Later this year the T.S.B. is due to become privatised and people will be able to buy shares in the bank.
